text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (——I thought it would be soon)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Soon. ……Soon, everyone, everything. 
……That everything would be back to normal)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (But then why——)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Sooooo hot～……hey, Trainer! Over here, over here～!! 
Ice cream, I was gonna buy some ice creamーーー! Treat me～♡
choice_data_list: This is why you messaged me on LANE?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Because. Ku-chan-senpai, seems kind of out of it? 
It's kinda warm. Maybe summer's getting to her? Sooo～ 
I thought it had to be ice cream! Don't ya think?☆
choice_data_list: That's a weird conclusion you came to

text_block_list.text:
But, well, you've both been working hard towards your autumn races, 
so some ice cream is fine. Did you already choose which to buy?

But, well, you've both been working hard towards your autumn races, 
so some ice cream is fine. Did you already choose which to buy?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
'Course! I already know exactly what senpai likes☆ 
C'mon, let's go, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
We're baaaack～♪ Senpai, we have ice cream! 
Let's eat some ice cream and recharge——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
——Senpai? ……Ku-chan-senpai? 
…………Are you asleep?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(At first, I thought it would be the same as always. 
Like after sunbathing, she'd be all drowsy)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (She just looked like she was fast asleep)
Kraft! ……Kraft, wake up! Kraft!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
H-……hey. Don't you think this is kind of strange? 
No matter what happened……it's weird……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (But, for some reason. ……Things just got weirder and weirder)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (More and more……——)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Just weirder and crazier…… 
And then finally)

text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
……I'm sorry. We've examined everything and did 
all we could but……The cause remains unknown……

No way……! J-just yesterday she was perfectly fine! 
And then to suddenly be like this……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (And then, just like that)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Ku-chan-senpai wasn't able to wake up)

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text:
Ehh……what's with this news? 
……Rhein Kraft is unconscious……!?

text_block_list.name: Passerby B
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? What does that mean!? She was just fine a little while ago…… 
Didn't she just say she was entering the 『Sprinter's S』 next!?

text_block_list.name: Passerby B
text_block_list.text:
No way……why? 
Not yet……wasn't she just getting started……!?

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text:
This can't be true, right……? 
Really……she can't wake up now……?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Rumors about senpai spread like wildfire. 
……So many people came to visit her. Everyday)

……Ah, you girls——Thank you. 
You came again today……

……Ah, you girls——Thank you. 
You came again today……

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
No problem. We came because we wanted to. 
……Rather than that, are you all okay? Are you getting enough rest?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Especially Trainer-san. You've been here everyday, 
haven't you? So……about Kraft-san's condition……
……It hasn't changed. She's……still asleep.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Senpai's hospital room is always overflowing with people worrying 
about her, day in and day out. Everyday. Every single day)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Everyday. ……We're here too)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(We've tried holding her hand, pulling on her cheek, hitting 
her forehead. We've tried calling her name, praying, shouting)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Calling her stupid, a sleepyhead, saying 
all kinds of things. ——And even then)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Senpai is still, still……not waking up)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……What?

To be honest……I don't think you're in a position 
to be able to concentrate on a race. That's why 
……I'll let you decide whether to participate——

To be honest……I don't think you're in a position 
to be able to concentrate on a race. That's why 
……I'll let you decide whether to participate——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Huh? I'm participating!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I'm entering, don't be stupid! 
Because I……I promised her……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I made a promise with senpai! At the next 『Shuka Sho』 for sure! 
That I'll win, and let senpai see it!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: 『One more time』『One more time』, as many times as it takes——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Until I win! By not giving up and continuing to run——!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……That's right. Senpai and I decided on it already. 
『Whatever happens』『No matter what』……never giving up.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
That's why……that's why I'll enter the 『Shuka Sho』. 
I'll definitely enter. And then I'll win!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: I'll show senpai that I can win……!!

I need to stay focused too. Let's work hard together 
for the 『Shuka Sho』. For Kraft……let's win for her……!

I need to stay focused too. Let's work hard together 
for the 『Shuka Sho』. For Kraft……let's win for her……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Yeah. ……Please, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Ku-chan-senpai. ……I'll win. 
I'll keep that promise for sure. Definitely!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (That's why……senpai)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Just watch me——!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……!! 
Trainer, next!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I can keep going. 
I can still keep going, no problem!!

(Pandora……that's it, do your best, Pandora……! 
I'll support you and that never-give-up attitude!)

(Pandora……that's it, do your best, Pandora……! 
I'll support you and that never-give-up attitude!)

(And then we'll show Kraft! That you can win…… 
That we can get that Autumn Tiara that she missed out on!)

(And then we'll show Kraft! That you can win…… 
That we can get that Autumn Tiara that she missed out on!)
……And then, the 『Shuka Sho』——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
From the inside, Fusaichi Pandora presses forward! 
Fusaichi Pandora, closes with the front!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
But from the outside it's Kawakami Princess! 
She's here, she's here, it's Kawakami Princess!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Without stopping, she pulls ahead! Kawakami 
Princess is strong! Now, she crosses the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Haa-……! Haa, haa, haa, cough……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……～～～Aaaahh!! 
Daaaamnit……!

She gave her all during the 『Shuka Sho』. But Kawakami Princess 
defeated her with overwhelming strength. Her result was 3rd……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Sorry, senpai. The 『Shuka Sho』……I lost.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Our promise……I wasn't able to keep it……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Trainer…… 
……Were you talking with the doctor just now?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: About Ku-chan-senpai……what did they say?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Tell me.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Please. I want to know, too. 
——Please.

I've had them examine her multiple times……They also looked in 
to seeing if this has happened before……And their conclusion——

The chances of Kraft regaining consciousness…… 
They think it's close to zero.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……I see.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Understood. ……Thanks. Sorry.

I……couldn't say anything to her. 
I couldn't find the right words.
Damnit!! Damnit, damnit……!!

Even though she's persevered through so many hardships! 
And I couldn't even help her win the 『Rose S』 or 『Shuka Sho』……!

I've just been wallowing in pity. I know in my head that I shouldn't 
be so pessimistic……just watching Rhein Kraft sleep like this——
——I pause. Seeing 『Her』……I hadn't seen her in so long.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's been a while, Trainer. 
How is Kraft……——

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Kraft. Aaah——how did this happen——
choice_data_list: ……Sorry. Even though I was with her——
……Sorry. Even though I was with her——

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
…………No. No——I'm sorry. 
I didn't come here just to cry.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I didn't come here to feel dejected or nostalgic. ……『We'll meet 
again in that future we dreamed of』. Because that was our promise.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Rather than that……Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: There's something I want you to see.
